tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE subscriber_preferences (
    subscriber_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    email_address VARCHAR,
    interaction_history JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
    subscriber_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    subscription_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    subscriber_id UUID REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    content_id UUID,
    interaction_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
    subscriber_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    subscription_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
  subscriber_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  email_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  subscription_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
  interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  subscriber_id INT REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id),
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  interaction_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE subscribers (
    subscriber_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    subscription_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE subscriber_preferences (
    preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    subscriber_id UUID,
    preference_key VARCHAR(50),
    preference_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id)
);

CREATE TABLE subscriber_interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    subscriber_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_content TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id)
);

CREATE TABLE personalized_emails (
    email_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    subscriber_id UUID,
    email_subject VARCHAR(255),
    email_body TEXT,
    send_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (subscriber_id) REFERENCES subscribers(subscriber_id)
);
